parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can severely limit visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially during heavy rain or snowy conditions.
symptoms: Windshield wipers operate intermittently
stop working suddenly
or fail to work at all
causing reduced visibility while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat bolt can cause the driver's seat to break or collapse, obstructing the driver's view and making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The driver's seat breaks or collapses
the seat latch fails
the seat suddenly reclines
the bolts holding the seat break
the driver's view is obstructed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake System Failure - Soft Pedal and Loss of Braking Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause a loss of braking power, leading to increased stopping distances and a higher risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes all the way to the floor
the vehicle takes longer to stop
the front brakes do all the braking
the rear brakes are in new condition despite high mileage.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Brake Pad Wear - Premature Wear
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature wear of the front brake pads can lead to reduced braking power and increased stopping distances, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The front brake pads wear out quickly
requiring frequent replacements
the rear brakes are in new condition despite high mileage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS brake system can cause a loss of braking power, leading to increased stopping distances and a higher risk of accidents.
symptoms: The ABS brake system fails
the rotors are worn out
the brake system malfunction indicator light comes on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake lights can increase the risk of rear-end collisions, as other drivers may not be aware of the vehicle's intention to stop.
symptoms: Brake lights do not illuminate
brake lights are dim or intermittent
brake lights do not turn off
brake lights are stuck on
difficulty shifting into park or removing the key from the ignition.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition switch or shifter interlock can cause difficulty turning off the vehicle, leading to increased wear on the starter motor and potentially causing it to fail.
symptoms: Difficulty shifting into park
difficulty removing the key from the ignition
hard to engage the shift lever to park
killing the starter motor.
